resources.string: The Training and Placement Cell of the institute handles all aspects of placements at PU for the students of all departments. It is a student body, directly under the supervision of the honourable Director, headed by the Training and Placement Officer and guided by the Faculty Advisers .The Cell stands for branding the outlook of the university to the corporate and the industry. The Training and Placement Officer, Coordinators and the student representatives handle various crucial tasks in the Cell like reaching out to companies, scheduling and executing placement related activities and carrying out all official communication with recruiters and students. The Cell strives to match recruiter expectations with studentsâ€™ aspirations. The team of student representatives coordinate the activities to ensure compliance with various institute policies and company officials, who execute coordination with their recruiting organisations. Over the years the Cell has gone from strength to strength in achieving outstanding placements at PU and will continue to do so in the years to come.
